crypto.name: LCGs are SBGs
crypto.desc:
SBG
The wise Neobeo and Genni once told me a burrito recipe, but I forgot it! Remind me, what is the perfect burrito recipe?

crypto.name: a special place in reality
crypto.desc:
helloperson
Well my RSA just isn't decrypting anymore so I'll just give you an oracle which gives you information about my messages. Maybe you can piece it back together?

crypto.name: flcg
crypto.desc:
helloperson
Surely you can't crack my float-based lcg, it's too high for you to reach.

Every ctf has to have a chall called 'saas'. Its just tradition.

crypto.name: sums
crypto.desc:
snow
I have a funny game, unfortunately the odds of you winning are basically 0, but I'm bored, so play with me and I'll give you a flag if you win.

forensic.name: rorecovery1

neil
this file was corrupted after my girlfriend threw my PC out the window! help!!!

neil

forensic.name: rorecovery3
forensic.desc:
neil
an old builder left this behind seems like his girlfriend threw his computer out the window too. everything at LEAST seems randomly placed... until you LOOK closer.

misc.name: Project Holoswap
misc.desc:
Sahuang
After their graduation, .;,;. sealed away the souls of Gura and Amelia in an archive AI. Now, a glitch gives you one chance to spoof the system.

“a... that's kinda sus...”

snow
Nothing wrong here. Nope. Stev the intern is very good at writing code.

misc.name: TI 1984

snow
Seems Stev the Intern made a... mistake in my last server. No matter! Now it's surely unescapable!

Cows are violent criminals. So we jail them. Anyways enjoy this cowsay program!

honestly i think this one is harder than last year's guessctf, and you have half the time to finish it... so uh... good luck!

misc.name: multisig wallet
misc.desc:
Broken Appendix
This multisig wallet lets the owners distribute a shared fund of tokens. Distribute all the tokens in the wallet without the controllers' permission.

misc.name: offset
misc.desc:
helloperson / quasar
somehow this exists, don't question why

misc.name: sky
misc.desc:
smashmaster
look at the sky, what do you see? a bird? a plane? no, its a challenge about the sky! (autocomplete wrote everything after the first 4 words)

pwn.name: accelerator
pwn.desc:
unvariant
We found this old system that claims to have hardware accelerated image processing capabilities, but we can't figure out how to interact with it! There is also a strange program located in /bin/check that seems to communicate with the device.

pwn.name: babyrop
pwn.desc:
Eth007
bopity ropity rop. the cop ran up the mop. the mop struck two, and over he flew, bopity ropity rop.

pwn.desc:
unvariant
GDB is safe if you never run the binary right?

pwn.name: debuggable 3
pwn.desc:
unvariant

pwn.name: limit
pwn.desc:
cope
I heard you could malloc into scary places, so im adding a check to prevent that from ever happening!

rev.name: liqUID glASS
rev.desc:
Sahuang
At WWDC 2025, Apple’s Human Interface “revolutionized” iOS with Liquid Glass—an effect, characterized by its fluid, jelly-like appearance, that adds a layer of interactivity to UI elements.

Here is my re-creation of liqUID glASS on Web and I applied it to the flag. Can you find it out?

rev.name: tables
rev.desc:
lunbun
After the last incident with young Bobby Tables, we found this mysterious binary on our systems. It seems to want a login, but we can't figure out what it's doing.
